headline: 3 Business Information Stocks to Watch Amid Industry Woes
summary: Increased demand for risk mitigation, cost reduction and productivity improvement solutions will likely help the Zacks Business Information Services industry prosper. EXPGY, IRM and TRU are well-positioned to benefit from this surge.
